content: sandralice designs slouchy beret in noro silk garden chunky you will need 2 x 50 grm balls of noro silk garden chunky 1 x 6mm us 10 circular needle 1 x 7mm us 10½/11 circular needle 1 x stitch marker gauge/gauge 16sts to 4 / 10cm over stocking stitch with 7mm us 10½/11 circular needle abbreviations kfb knit into the front and back of next stitch yo bring yarn to front of work p purl k knit beg beginning st/s stitch/es increase increase repeat repeat using size 6mm circular needle cast on 72 start decreases stitches taking care not to twist stitches join round 1 k7 k2tog repeat to marker into a round round 2 yo k6 k2tog repeat to marker place a marker to denote beg of round round 3 k6 k2tog repeat to marker work 9 rounds in a k3 p3 rib round 4 yo k5 k2tog repeat to marker change to size 7mm circular needle round 5 k5 k2tog repeat to marker rounds 1-3 purl round 6 yo k4 k2tog repeat to marker next round knit round 7 k4 k2tog repeat to marker next round yo k2tog to end round 8 yo k3 k2tog repeat to marker next round knit round 9 k3 k2tog repeat to marker rounds 7-9 purl round 10 yo k2 k2tog repeat to marker increase round kfb of next st k1 repeat to end round 11 k2 k2tog repeat to marker of round 108 sts round 12 yo k1 k2tog repeat to marker round 1 knit to marker round 13 k1 k2tog repeat to marker round 2 yo k7 k2tog repeat to marker round 14 k2tog repeat to marker repeat these 2 row 6 times more break yarn and thread through remaining sts pull up tight and fasten_off beckside yarns & needlecrafts beckside gallery church avenue clapham via lancaster la2 8ea tel 015242 51122 www becksideyarns co uk info@becksideyarns co uk facebook beckside yarns ravelry sandralice copyright © sandra oakeshott 2009 all rights reserved you may sell items made from my pattern if you have made with your own hands not for commercial use
